Mother's Day

Late for Spring

Strategic Insight: December-January represents the optimal procurement window for BOTH spring weddings AND Mother's Day. Bundling these orders can reduce total landed costs by an average of 18% compared to separate February/March purchases.

Fabric Recommendations

Bridal Mesh Embroidery

Spring Weddings 4-6 Weeks

Structured fabric engineered to hold beading and appliqué. Ideal for bridal gowns and formal evening wear. Available in ivory, white, and champagne colorways.

Target Segment: Dedicated bridal retailers

Crochet Lace

Mother's Day Bundling Opportunity

Lightweight construction with exceptional drape characteristics. Perfect for cocktail dresses and romantic overlays. Pastel palette optimized for spring season demand.

Target Segment: Contemporary boutiques

Fashion Embroidery

Versatile 3-5 Weeks

Seasonal floral motifs with cross-occasion versatility spanning weddings, Mother's Day, and graduation. Neutral colorways minimize inventory risk while maintaining aesthetic appeal.

Target Segment: Multi-demographic retailers

Ready to Optimize Your Procurement?

Our team provides personalized advisory on fabric selection, timing strategies, and inventory planning.

Contact Our Team

Response time: Within 24 hours · info@fominte.com

settings.sub_title1: Our technical team is ready to discuss your design, recommend materials, and optimize for production efficiency.
settings.sub_title2: We provide A4 swatches and sample yardage. Bring your vision to life before committing to bulk production.
settings.sub_title3: Your custom designs are your intellectual property. We guarantee strict Confidentiality and exclusivity.
settings.sub_title4: From boutique orders to large-scale manufacturing, our facility is equipped to handle your volume needs.
